AreaDetails.AreaDetail: 20 kms to the nearest airport (samui airport)

Reports.Report: KC Hotel Koh Samui is perched some 500m on the overhead land of the northern Chaweng beach
The Grand Deluxe Jacuzzi Room features an indoor Chromo Therapy Double Seat Jacuzzi bath tub and a small balcony.
Breakfast,Lunch and Dinner are available in this property

KC Resort & Over Water Villas provides 95 exclusive rooms, suites and villas that will exceed your expectations, in a secluded estate enjoying stunning views over the cobalt blue sea and outlying islands of Koh Samui. Every room features complimentary WiFi, over size king bed with double seat Jacuzzi with light therapy system and rain shower column with acupressure jet, cordless telephone, safety box, mini bar, hair dryer with shaver socket.

RoomCategory.RoomDescription: The Grand Deluxe Jacuzzi Room features an indoor Chromo Therapy Double Seat Jacuzzi bath tub and a small balcony.
Deluxe room is 40 units with King Size Bed only with unparallel panorama sea view. King size custom with a under light bed and crystal water stone tiles.

Grand family suite has 3 units of spacious Intimate bedroom Luxury Suite with 2 trendy HIP design King Size Beds Looking Panorama view with outdoor Double seater Jacuzzi. And Grand Junior Suite Sea View is 76 sqm. ,offers 1 Bedroom + 1 Separate Living Room, Over Sized King Bed. Room with Ocean Sea view.

Grand family suite has 3 units of spacious Intimate bedroom Luxury Suite with 2 trendy HIP design King Size Beds Looking Panorama view with outdoor Double seater Jacuzzi. And Grand Junior Suite Sea View is 76 sqm. ,offers 1 Bedroom + 1 Separate Living Room, Over Sized King Bed. Room with Ocean Sea view.

Over water villa sea view is 16 units of spacious intimate Luxury Over Water Villas. Full luxury essence aromatherapy bathroom, amenities in the walk thru, 2 wash basin area with Teak wood Parquet flooring. Over Water Villas built on stilts above 60m² crystal aquamarine infinity pool with an unparalleled panorama view and guest are able to swim under the villa. Designed with emphasis on Bora Bora concept on natural materials hard teak woods, cedar roof and harmoniously blending with the environment.
